comments:
Everyonce in a while when i start Eclipse, i get this error and sometimes all 
icons in the Package Explorer are missing:

It looks like a class/bundle loading problem. Unfortunately, I have no ideas 
on how to pinpoint the problem. Assigning to Core since they may have some 
insight. Given that the CVSLightweightDecorator class is involved, it may be a 
symptom of multiple threads trying to startup the same plugin or load the same 
class.

yes, i guess it's a thread problem, because this occurs every once in a while 
when starting Eclipse (about 1-2 times a week). Restarting Eclipse again helps.

Version 2.1.2
Build: 200311030802

Feature Updates didn't find any newer versions.
moving to Core.  This is a 2.1.2 problem.
